title: Oh Priya Priya Song Lyrics Geethanjali
stanzas: <div>Oh Priya Priya Song Lyrics Geethanjali

Oh priya priya
en priya priya
yezhai kadhal vazhumo
irulum oliyum serumo

nee orr oaram
naan orr oaram
kaanal neeraal
thaagam theeraadhu

Oh priya priya
un priya priya
Oh priya priya
un priya priya

inainthidaadhu povadho
vaanam boomi aavadho
kaalam siridhu
kadhal manadhu
thevan neethaan ponaal vidadhu

thaedum kangale
thaembum nenjame
veedum poiyadi
vazhvum poiyadi

anbu konda nenjamum
aasai konda nenjamum
aanaiyittu maarumo
penmai thaangumo

raaja mangai kangale
endrum ennai moipatho
vaadum yezhai ingo
or paavi allavao

edhanaalum orunaalum
maraiyaadhu pemaiyum
erithaalum marithaalum
vilagaatha paasamo

kanni maanum unnudan
kalandhathenna paavamo
kadhal enna kaatrile
kulaindha pogum megamo

ammaadi naanum yaengavo
neeyum vaa vaa

Oh Priya priya
en priya priya
Oh priya priya
un priya priya

Kaalithaasan yedugal
kanna raasa leelaigal
paruva mogam thandhadhu
paavam allavae.

Shajahanin kadhali
Tajmahal poongili
paasam vaitha paavamthaan
saavum vandhadhu

irandhaale iravaadhu
vilaigindra premaiye
adi neeye valiyaaga
varugindra penmaiye

vizhiyil pookkum nesamaai
punithamaana bandhamaai
pesum indha paasame
ingu vetri kollume

ilankanni unnudan
kooda vaa vaa

Oh Priya priya
en priya priya
Oh priya priya
un priya priya

yaekkam enna payingili
ennai vandhu seradi
nenjam rendum naalum paada
kaaval thaandi poovai
ingaada

kaadhal keethanam
kaanum mangalam
thaemai naadagam
penmai aadidum.
